title: Bloomberg Markets: Uber CEO Hints at IPO, Vanarama's U.S. Debut
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Uber CEO Hints at IPO, Vanarama's U.S. Debut
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Gerrit De Vynck Canadian Tech and Telecom Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing new Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi addressing employees for first time Wednesdayand saying the company could go public in 18 to 36 months. Andrew Alderson Chief Executive Officer Vanarama Discussing the U.K. app that delivers vans, trucks and SUVs to small business owners coming to the U.S.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
